artist: Painter: After John Vanderbank; Engraver: John Henry Robinson; Publisher: John Major
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: J. Vanderbank pinx't    H. Robinson sculp't / GEORGE LAMBERT / London / Published by John Major 50 Fleet Street / Oct'r 15th 1827 | in pencil on sheet: 1-621 | on verso in pencil: 2/6
life_date: After John Vanderbank, Painter, British, 1694–1739; John Henry Robinson, Engraver, British, 1796–1871; John Major, Publisher, British, 1809–1839
title: Portrait of George Lambert
